did.abstract: An 1842 balance sheet signed by accountant J.H. Paterson listing streets and other projects in Brooklyn and their monetary values or real estate values, debits, and credits.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1977.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single document.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Brooklyn, New York balance sheet, 1977.443, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A balance sheet listing streets and other projects in Brooklyn and their monetary values or real estate values, debits, and credits. The total is $366,186.25. The document is signed by J.H. Paterson, Accountant. It is dated October 31, 1842.
